description: Frax is the first fractional-algorithmic stablecoin protocol. This means that parts of its supply are backed by collateral and parts of the supply algorithmic. Frax is open-source, permissionless, and entirely on-chain â€“ currently implemented on Ethereum and other chains. The end goal of the Frax protocol is to provide a highly scalable, decentralized, algorithmic money in place of fixed-supply digital assets like BTC.
